issue.title: [Python] Remove "experimental" status from Table.replace_schema_metadata
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11980](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11980). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Table and RecordBatch `replace_schema_metadata` method's docstring has "EXPERIMENTAL, but I don't think there is a need to label it like that any longer (the method has been there for multiple years)
